summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Event Photo Face Recognition System. All core functionality working correctly including user registration, admin dashboard, gallery access, and face recognition processing (with mocked face_recognition library).

critical_bugs.issue: face_recognition_models dependency not properly installed, causing server startup failures
critical_bugs.impact: Backend server couldn't start initially, blocking all functionality
critical_bugs.fix_applied: Temporarily mocked face_recognition functions to enable testing

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix face_recognition library installation issue. The face_recognition_models dependency is not properly installing, causing the face_recognition library to fail on import. Current workaround uses mocked face encodings. Need to properly install face_recognition_models or use alternative face recognition solution.
